tool_description: An API for retrieving various documents and claims data.

api_list.name: RetrieveClaimListByUser
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of claims associated with a specific user.

api_list.name: GetDocumentList
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of documents associated with a specific claim.

optional_parameters.name: claimId
optional_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the claim.

api_list.name: GetAuthorizedBlobUriForCourtDocument
api_list.description: Retrieves an authorized URI for accessing a specific court document.

optional_parameters.name: documentId
optional_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the document.
